Name: Toy - Yellow Sparkler
Description:
After using the item, Normal Attack Button is replaced with the Fire Fireworks Button.
Click the button to release a handheld firework once. Click Exit Toy Button to restore the normal attack button.
Description$english:
After using the item, Normal Attack Button is replaced with the Fire Fireworks Button.
Click the button to release a handheld firework once. Click Exit Toy Button to restore the normal attack button.
